description: API Update for RDS: this update enables copy-on-write, a new Aurora MySQL Compatible Edition feature that allows users to restore their database, and support copy of TDE enabled snapshot cross region.

Switches S3 to use signatureVersion "v4" by default. To continue using signatureVersion "v2", set the signatureVersion: "v2" option in the S3 service client configuration. Presigned URLs will continue using "v2" by default.
